#Welcome to RMC14.
RMC14 is inspired by CM13 Space Station 13, in the new SS14 engine!
Please read the rules, as the administation staff will assume and treat you as if you had, even if you did not.
The guidebook, roadmap and rules for the game can be found on the lobby screen, and at any point in the escape menu.
- [textlink="Click here to read the rules." link="RMCOverview"]
